name: Sharpie Shooter
description:
Sharpie Shooter is a Hand-Drawn R-Type Clone made for the Game Design and Development Course at TU Graz.

You are invaded by Aliens. Defend yourself using your trusty space ship with its 3-Burster Gun. Aliens might drop bomb power ups. Use them to your advantage.

To win the game you have defeat the Mother of all Aliens: The Derpkeratops!

Good Luck!

Controls:

Player 1 Move
WASDPlayer 1 Shoot
SpacePlayer 1 Bomb
BombPlayer 2 Move
Arrow Keys
Player 2 Shoot
Enter / NUM 0
Player 2 Bomb
Left Shift / NUM 1

Source Code
